name: Kink
description: Use your drawing skills to trace over looped curves created by the game, and avoid the black spot or you will get kinked.
minimum_requirements: OS: XP Processor: Intel Single Core Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 2004 GPU Storage: 200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: 7 Processor: Intel Multi Core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 2010 GPU Storage: 200 MB available space
